snippet: Denver Nuggets General Manager Masai Ujiri was named the N.B.A.’s executive of the year a day after the Nuggets’ George Karl won the coach of the year award.
abstract: Denver Nuggets general manager Masai Ujiri is named the NBA’s executive of the year.
lead_paragraph: Denver Nuggets General Manager Masai Ujiri was named the N.B.A.’s executive of the year a day after the Nuggets’ George Karl won the coach of the year award.

headline.seo: Nuggets General Manager Masai Ujiri Wins Executive of the Year Award
headline.main: Nuggets General Manager Wins N.B.A. Executive of the Year Award
